org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep
Interface Attributes<T extends java.lang.Enum<T> & AzCategoryId>

Type Parameters:
T -
All Known Subinterfaces:
Obligation, RequestAttributes<T>, ResponseAttributes<T>
public interface Attributes<T extends java.lang.Enum<T> & AzCategoryId>

A basic wrapper for an AzEntity<T> object that can be used for both request and response attribute collections.

The AzEntity<T> interface is the primary interface used by the JavaObjectMapper.map(Object, RequestAttributes) method to map Native Java objects to the associated XACML attributes in the AzRequestContext object. Each AzEntity<T> object contains XACML AzAttributes within a certain AzCategoryId subtype.

The JavaObjectMapper.map(obj,reqAttr) method can determine from AzEntity.getAzCategoryId() obtained using getAzEntity() what the AzCategoryId of the collection is so that the appropriate attributes can be extracted and mapped from the native Java object supplied to the JavaObjectMapper

In general, for the JavaObjectMappers, the RequestAttributes object is used to set the specific values of attributes.

Author:
Josh Bregman, Rich Levinson, Prateek Mishra

Method Summary
 AzEntity<T> getAzEntity()
          Return the underlying AzEntity<T> attribute collection that is contained by this object wrapper.
